sense.def:
To go upstairs in a building
pomeni iti v višje nadstropje v stavbi.

Nekdo ali nekaj je
upstairs
, kadar je v gornjem nadstropju stavbe.

seg.quote: Upstairs, there were three little bedrooms.

sense.def:
The upstairs of a building
je gornje nadstropje ali gornja nadstropja neke stavbe;

seg.quote: They had to rent out the upstairs to make the mortgage payments.

sense.def:
Soba ali predmet, ki je
upstairs
, je v gornjem nadstropju stavbe.

seg.quote: Neighbours watched from their upstairs windows.
